about_the_game:
Trap Master is a sequel to our first game Candy Disaster, a trap defense game inspired by Orcs Must Die. In Trap Master, we are keeping the tower defense essentials, and adding roguelike elements and deckbuilding gameplay into the mix.

We hope this would bring a unique and different experience. If it sounds interesting to you, be sure to wishlist the game!


  • Roguelike Deckbuilding meets Tower Defense
  • 100+ cleverly-designed bases to defend
  • 80+ cards to choose and upgrade
  • 40 deadly traps to build up your defense
  • 29 unique enemies to challenge and destroy
  • Procedural generated system for extensive replayability
  • Events and encounters to spice up the adventure

Are you ready to become the Trap Master?



Set the tone of your build from 40 upgradable traps. Enhance your defense with over 40 skills and powers. From old-fashioned spike and blade traps, clever environmental-kill devices, to various projectile launchers and surprise attacks!



29 types of enemies and over 100 bases provide unique challenges to test your defense. Flying paratroopers, incredibly fast stallions, dinosaur riders that could command an army of dinosaurs… These goons will stop at nothing to penetrate your bases.


Choose your path and defend each base till the last! During this roguelike journey, you will also encounter many curious events. Think twice before you act – You might be rewarded with rare findings, or end up crippled with a curse.
detailed_description:
Trap Master is a sequel to our first game Candy Disaster, a trap defense game inspired by Orcs Must Die. In Trap Master, we are keeping the tower defense essentials, and adding roguelike elements and deckbuilding gameplay into the mix.

We hope this would bring a unique and different experience. If it sounds interesting to you, be sure to wishlist the game!

  • 40 deadly traps to build up your defense

  • Procedural generated system for extensive replayability
  • Events and encounters to spice up the adventure

name: CD 2: Trap Master Demo
short_description: 3D tower defense + roguelike deckbuilding: Craft a deck, lay out traps, ward off enemies, and navigate through the map until you confront the boss! Make use of a variety of funny & creative traps to shoot, stab and scorch enemies!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, German, Japanese, Russian, Traditional Chinese
